body_content.explanation: an exercise to make your triceps (= the large muscle at the back of the upper arm) stronger. It involves raising and lowering your body on your hands with your arms bent behind you, while in a sitting position with your legs straight out in front of you:
examples: Tricep dips are great exercises for skiers.
Triceps dips are one of the best ways to tone your triceps, according to research from the American Council on Exercise.
